pr_title: Refactor JavaTree children() method to return List instead of Iterable

timeline.message: Refactor JavaTree children() method to return List instead of Iterable

timeline.bodyText: so cool we can drop the AbstractIterator!
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

replies.bodyText: I guess this class (fully covered btw :) ) lived for a couple of hours
replies.author: margarita-nedzelska-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText:
So we cab probably change next line to:
children = children().stream()
  .filter(Objects::nonNull)
  .collect(Collectors.toList());
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: There are some unit tests that add the result of this method into another list to do assertions. It worth modifying them to simplify a bit.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar
